Name: FEAR background
About the game: FEAR - a horror game made in realistic 3D graphics, immersing in an atmosphere of horror and fear. Brief background: The main character, Deacon, an office worker, is struggling with some illness, because of it he can control his dreams. You have to overcome your fear, going through gloomy locations for the main character, along the way solving various puzzles and trying to understand what is happening in general, in what the lines with which Deacon accompanies various situations will help you. Believe me, the atmosphere in the game can cause fear from everything from a brick falling from a wall to a suddenly opening door. The game is still at an early stage of development, but in the future there will be many more locations and mysteries to be solved.
